price: Wͻbεka sε: ”Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn, y'ahokyere anaa ohia broo yεn so, εna yεbεyεε nnipa a wͻn ayera.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat ʿalaynā shiq'watunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīna
